name: CHRISTMAS ANGEL
description: Christmas Angel strikkes frem og tilbage i ét stykke i retstrik med i-cordkanter fra spids til bund. Vingerne strikkes på samme måde, og til sidst monteres disse på englen og en træperle samt snor monteres.
category: Decorative → Hanging Ornament Decorative → Christmas Stocking
full_text: Christmas Angel is knitted back and forth in one piece in garter stitch with i-cord edges from top to bottom. The wings are knitted in the same way, and finally these are mounted on the angel and a wooden bead and string are mounted. Sizes: small (large) Length: 7 (9) cm Knitting density: 20 stitches x 40 rows in garter stitch on needle 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm Guideline needles: Double pointed needles 3 mm Materials: Angel: approx. 5-10 g Semilla Melange GOTS from BC Yarn (50 g = 175 m) Wings: approx. 3-5 g Semilla Melange GOTS from BC Garn (50 g = 175 m) 1 wooden bead (Ø 10 MM) Degree of difficulty: ★ ★ (2 out of 5) The white and purple colored Christmas Angels are knitted in Semilla Melange GOTS from BC Garn, in the colors Nature 01 and Dark Purple 14.
